title: Crab dip
ingredients: ['3 shallots, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '80g butter', '110ml cream', '150g cream cheese', '1 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons Worcester sauce', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh tarragon', '70g grated Cheddar cheese', '300g crabmeat', '60g dried white breadcrumbs']
